Uses of Interface
bg.x2d.anim.Segment

Packages that use Segment
bg.x2d.anim   
 

Uses of Segment in bg.x2d.anim
 

Classes in bg.x2d.anim that implement Segment
 class ComboSegment
           
 class CurveSegment
           
 class DilationSegment
          Segment that scales the AffineTransform of this Graphics object based on x,y scale factors, time duration and size of the canvas being draw upon (optional).
 class RotationSegment
          Segment that rotates the AffineTransform a specified number of degrees, over a specified amount of time and around an optional anchor point.
 class TranslationSegment
          Segment that translates the AffineTransform the specified amounts on the x and y axes for the specified amount of time.
 

Methods in bg.x2d.anim that return Segment
 Segment Animation.getCurrentSegment()
          Fetches the currently active Segment in this Animation.
 

Constructors in bg.x2d.anim with parameters of type Segment

          Creates this animation with the given segments.
